issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).

issues.title: Img element is the only content of the link, but is missing alt text. The alt text should describe the purpose of the link.

original_issue.message: Img element is the only content of the link, but is missing alt text. The alt text should describe the purpose of the link.
